title: Ohlone Heritage Hub
description: Working with Dr. Lueck and Dr. Panich, I created the Ohlone Heritage Hub, which is still used by Santa Clara University today to demonstrate how important the Ohlone are to Santa Clara's history.

title: PortalPortal Demo
description: This is a demo video of the platform I worked on from Dec. 2022 to Dec. 2023. I was the sole front end developer for this proof of concept platform.

title: Fit4U Demo
description: This is my favorite project I worked on while at Santa Clara. My group and I made a full stack workout logging app .
